title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama) to use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, tool callers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now named Open WebUI); markdown, code highlighting, multi-user, RAG.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper that adds conversation history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service powered by Ollama; VS Code extension included.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; idiomatic Ruby API with streaming and model utils.

title: ollama-chat-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community-curated registry of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for ollama pull.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Collection of recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, RAG, fine-tuning, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-gui-react
summary: Lightweight React-based desktop GUI (Tauri) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, Postgres, and GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration package (pip: haystack-ollama) to use Ollama models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed, async wrappers over Ollama's REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers channel mentions using local Ollama models with rate-limiting and audit logs.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify LLM orchestration platform adapter letting you plug Ollama models into no-code AI apps.
